resources.string: Updating this application may result in incompatibility with one of your modules and the application might crash
Are you sure you want to install this application?
Warning, when user clicks update button
Rapid update is update forced by google play
Reset list of version, which will be ignored in update list
Saves list of all apps installed on the device

Restores saved apps. This will only install applications saved with button above with the same version. It won\'t restore app cache! If within a minute nothing will happen open Playstore and click this again.
By enabling this feature, you accept that application developers may download any apps to your device from play store. Use it carefully!
You must enable enhanced installer to do this!
